titleStmt.title: By the Lord Lieutenant and Council Essex whereas in an act of Parliament, lately passed in this Kingdom, entituled, An act for the explaining of some doubts, a rising upon an entituled, an Act for the better execution of His Majesties gracious declaration for the settlement of his kingdome of Ireland ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
Essex, Arthur Capel, Earl of, 1631-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke, Printer to the King's Most Excellent Majesty and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ....,

notesStmt.note: "Given at the Council chamber in Dublin the fifteenth day of Bebruary, 1674" -- p.52.
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
